|division_titles = '7' (1926â27, 1931â32, 1941â42, 1989â90, 1991â92, 1993â94,
2011â12) |website = [http://rangers.nhl.com/ rangers.nhl.com] }} The 'New York
Rangers' are a professional ice hockey team based in the borough of Manhattan in
New York City. They are members of the Metropolitan Division of the Eastern
Conference of the National Hockey League (NHL). Playing their home games at
Madison Square Garden, the Rangers are one of the oldest teams in the NHL,
having joined in 1926 as an expansion franchise. They are part of the group of
teams referred to as the Original Six, along with the Boston Bruins, Chicago
Blackhawks, Detroit Red Wings, Montreal Canadiens, and Toronto Maple Leafs. The
Rangers were the first NHL franchise in the United States to win the Stanley
Cup, which they have done four times, most recently
in 1993â94.
